thread.title: Exotic animals rescued when owners flee Oroville Dam | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Exotic animals rescued when owners flee Oroville Dam | Daily Mail Online

author: Kiri Blakeley For Dailymail.Com
title: Exotic animals rescued when owners flee Oroville Dam | Daily Mail Online
text: Exotic animals including albino kangaroo, mini-deer, and ZEBRAS are rescued after being abandoned when their owners fled in California Dam crisis The animals were happened upon when authorities were checking abandoned properties in the area Hundreds of thousands of people had to flee Sunday when it seemed the state's highest dam might burst, drowning the nearby towns California Highway Patrol found the trove of animals and brought them to a veteran rescuer who volunteered to keep them on her property until they can be reunited with their owners Published: 04:21 GMT, 16 February 2017 | Updated: 13:31 GMT, 16 February 2017 130 shares
